typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		lgacandate as timestamp,
		lgaclmcat as string,
		lgaclmtype as string,
		lgacrcode as string,
		lgacrcrdate as timestamp,
		lgacrcrsign as string,
		lgacrdate as timestamp,
		lgacrlgaid as string,
		lgacrsign as string,
		lgacrynsw as string,
		lgaendate as timestamp,
		lgaguaamt as decimal(38,18),
		lgaguacurr as string,
		lgaintnote as string,
		lgaintynsw as string,
		lgajurisdiction as string,
		lgaknvmark as string,
		lgalcaid as string,
		lgalccid as string,
		lgalgaid as string,
		lgaln2 as decimal(38,18),
		lgaludate as timestamp,
		lgalusign as string,
		lgaobocname as string,
		lgaobopeaid as decimal(38,18),
		lgareceiver as decimal(38,18),
		lgastatus as string,
		lgastdate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> plgatable
plgatable select(mapColumn(
		lgacrdate,
		lgaendate,
		lgaguaamt,
		lgaguacurr,
		lgalcaid,
		lgalgaid,
		lgastatus,
		lgastdate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> lgatable
